roleset.name: Already established
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

roleset.name: characterized by determination
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All args
example.text: I was determined to restore the range of motion and to return to my old exercise routine , so I in effect took charge of the rehab program and made it clear to the therapist the Orthopedic Surgeon that I would n't accept less .
example.arg: to restore the range of motion and to return to my old exercise routine
